mapper.insert: INSERT INTO petfood_event(event_no, member_no, event_title, event_content, event_thumb, event_img, event_imgsize, event_good, event_view, event_comment, event_rdate, event_endrdate, event_site, event_visibel, event_ck) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(event_no), 0)+1 as event_no FROM petfood_event), #{member_no}, #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_thumb}, #{event_img}, #{event_imgsize}, 0, 0, 0, sysdate, #{event_endrdate}, #{event_site}, #{event_visibel}, #{event_ck})
mapper.select: SELECT event_no, event_title, event_thumb, event_img, event_good, event_view, event_comment, event_rdate,event_imgsize, event_endrdate, event_visibel, event_ck FROM petfood_event ORDER BY event_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM petfood_event

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT event_no, event_title, event_thumb, event_img, event_good, event_view, event_comment, event_rdate, event_imgsize, event_endrdate, event_visibel, event_ck, rownum as r FROM petfood_event ORDER BY event_no DESC ) WHERE r >= #{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}
